availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John L. Worthington Jr. (Carter County, Kentucky, teamster)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, teamster. Pennsylvania native. Married to Sarah Worthington. Father of Leona Worthington, James F. Worthington, John W. Worthington, Sarah Worthington, and Charles D. Worthington. Teamster in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, pp. 203-04.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 1, pp. 11B-12A.
